content.raw:
I'm behind that...I have the feeling that might be the czmq version that I'm using in drone.io. It's using the latest version from the repository and it's not stable. I'm going to change to the tagged czmq v2.2.0. I'm running a local script in my machine that runs "make test" forever until a fail appears and now it has been 17 iterations without problem. But who knows...

Thanks for stay alert. I'm on it!
content.html:
I'm behind that...I have the feeling that might be the czmq version that I'm using in drone.io. It's using the latest version from the repository and it's not stable. I'm going to change to the tagged czmq v2.2.0. I'm running a local script in my machine that runs "make test" forever until a fail appears and now it has been 17 iterations without problem. But who knows...

Thanks for stay alert. I'm on it!

content.raw: drone.io changed to czmq version v2.2.0 (stable). I'll keep an eye on the tests.
